definition: A collection of sheets of paper bound together to hinge at one edge, containing printed or written material, pictures, etc.
example: He was frustrated because he couldn't find anything about dinosaurs in the book.
koExample: 그는 책에서 공룡에 대한 어떤 것도 찾을 수 없어서 좌절했다.

definition: A person other than a family member, spouse or lover whose company one enjoys and towards whom one feels affection.
example: John and I have been friends ever since we were roommates at college.   Trust is important between friends.   I used to find it hard to make friends when I was shy.
koExample: 존과 나는 대학 시절 룸메이트였을 때부터 친구였다.

definition: The act of going.
example: It’s your go.
koExample: 네 차례야.

definition: (collective) A group of fish or a group of marine mammals such as porpoises, dolphins, or whales.
example: The divers encountered a huge school of mackerel.
koExample: 다이버들은 거대한 고등어 떼를 만났다.

definition: A person who studies or learns about a particular subject.
example: He is a student of life.
koExample: 그는 삶의 학생이다.

definition: A person who teaches, especially one employed in a school.
example: 예문 없음.

definition: A substance (of molecular formula H₂O) found at room temperature and pressure as a clear liquid; it is present naturally as rain, and found in rivers, lakes and seas; its solid form is ice and its gaseous form is steam.
example: By the action of electricity, the water was resolved into its two parts, oxygen and hydrogen.
koExample: 전기의 작용으로 물은 산소와 수소 두 부분으로 분해되었다.

definition: The inevitable progression into the future with the passing of present and past events.
example: Time stops for nobody.   the ebb and flow of time
koExample: 시간은 누구를 위해서도 멈추지 않는다.

definition: Used as plural of person; a body of human beings considered generally or collectively; a group of two or more persons.
example: There were so many people at the restaurant last night.
koExample: 어젯밤 식당에 사람들이 너무 많았다.

definition: (with "the") Human collective existence; existence in general.
example: There will always be lovers, till the world’s end.
koExample: 세상 끝까지 언제나 연인들은 있을 것이다.

definition: An act or instance of asking.
example: I know this is a big ask, but …
koExample: 이것이 큰 부탁인 것을 알지만...

definition: To arrive, come (to a place).
example: It hath becomen so that many a man had to sterve.
koExample: 많은 사람들이 굶주려야 할 지경에 이르렀다.

definition: Beginning; start.
example: I began playing the piano at the age of five.   Now that everyone is here, we should begin the presentation.
koExample: 모두가 여기에 있으니, 이제 발표를 시작해야 한다.

definition: A telephone conversation.
example: I received several calls today.
koExample: 오늘 여러 통의 전화를 받았다.

definition: (auxiliary verb, defective) To know how to; to be able to.
example: She can speak English, French, and German.   I can play football.   Can you remember your fifth birthday?
koExample: 그녀는 영어, 프랑스어, 독일어를 할 수 있다.

definition: Coming, arrival; approach.
example: She’ll be coming ’round the mountain when she comes [...]
koExample: 그녀가 올 때면 산 주위를 돌아서 올 것이다.

definition: A party, celebration, social function.
example: We’re having a bit of a do on Saturday to celebrate my birthday.
koExample: 내 생일을 축하하기 위해 토요일에 작은 파티를 할 거야.

definition: A quality of an object experienced by touch.
example: Bark has a rough feel.
koExample: 나무껍질은 거친 느낌을 준다.

definition: Anything that is found (usually valuable), as objects on an archeological site or a person with talent.
example: I found my car keys. They were under the couch.
koExample: 나는 내 차 키를 찾았다. 그것들은 소파 밑에 있었다.

definition: Offspring.
example: I'm going to get a computer tomorrow from the discount store.
koExample: 나는 내일 할인점에서 컴퓨터를 한 대 살 거야.

definition: The amount of bending that something undergoes when a force is applied to it; a tendency to yield under pressure; resilence.
example: There is no give in his dogmatic religious beliefs.
koExample: 그의 독단적인 종교적 신념에는 융통성이 없다.

definition: A wealthy or privileged person.
example: I have a house and a car.
koExample: 나는 집과 차가 있다.

definition: (stative) To perceive sounds through the ear.
example: I was deaf, and now I can hear.
koExample: 나는 귀가 먹었었는데, 이제 들을 수 있다.

definition: Action given to provide assistance; aid.
example: I need some help with my homework.
koExample: 숙제 좀 도와줘.

definition: The main tower of a castle or fortress, located within the castle walls.
example: He works as a cobbler's apprentice for his keep.
koExample: 그는 숙식을 제공받는 조건으로 구두장이의 제자로 일한다.

definition: Knowledge; the state of knowing.
example: He knew something terrible was going to happen.
koExample: 그는 무언가 끔찍한 일이 일어날 것을 알았다.

definition: To have a consequence or remnant.
example: 예문 없음.

definition: The allowing of possession of a property etc. in exchange for rent.
example: After he knocked for hours, I decided to let him come in.
koExample: 그가 몇 시간 동안 문을 두드린 후에야, 나는 그를 들어오게 하기로 결정했다.

definition: (usually in the plural) Something that a person likes (prefers).
example: Tell me your likes and dislikes.
koExample: 네가 좋아하는 것과 싫어하는 것을 말해줘.

definition: To be alive; to have life.
example: He's not expected to live for more than a few months.
koExample: 그는 몇 달 이상 살지 못할 것으로 예상된다.

definition: Brand or kind; model.
example: What make of car do you drive?
koExample: 어떤 브랜드의 차를 운전하니?

definition: To be strong; to have power (over).
example: you may smoke outside;  may I sit there?
koExample: 밖에 나가서 담배를 피워도 좋다.

definition: To lament.
example: Does she really mean what she said to him last night?
koExample: 그녀는 어젯밤 그에게 말한 것을 정말로 의미한 것일까?

definition: The act of moving; a movement.
example: A slight move of the tiller, and the boat will go off course.
koExample: 키를 살짝만 움직여도 배는 항로를 벗어날 것이다.

definition: A requirement for something; something needed.
example: I've always tried to have few needs beyond food, clothing and shelter.
koExample: 나는 항상 음식, 옷, 주거지 외에는 욕구가 거의 없으려 노력했다.

definition: Activity for amusement only, especially among the young.
example: Children learn through play.
koExample: 아이들은 놀이를 통해 배운다.

definition: A right to sell something at a predetermined price.
example: He bought a January '08 put for Procter and Gamble at 80 to hedge his bet.
koExample: 그는 자신의 내기에서 위험을 회피하기 위해 프록터 앤드 갬블에 대한 1월 '08 풋옵션(80달러)을 샀다.

definition: To run.
example: I just got back from my morning run.
koExample: 나는 방금 아침 달리기를 마치고 돌아왔다.
